overview: A Chicago hockey star is accosted by a youth gang who attempt to rob him; after he chases them off he catches the youngest member and gives him a ride home, where he meets the boy's mother.
tagline: Yesterday, he was a fun loving sports hero. Today he's had his life threatened, his Jaguar wrecked, his career jeopardized... And now someone's trying to cook him breakfast.
title: Touch and Go
